title: Add Pizza Palace generated images and wire them into centralized image resolution

requirements.summary: Add new generated static image assets for Pizza Palace cover and its 5 menu items under frontend/public/assets/generated/ using consistent .dim_* filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: The following new image files exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filenames specified in Image Requirements.
Each image is the correct dimension based on its filename suffix (1200x600 for the cover; 512x512 for dish images).

file_operations.description: Add the generated Pizza Palace restaurant cover static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/restaurant-pizza-palace-cover.dim_1200x600.png` (1200x600).
Add the generated dish static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-margherita-pizza.dim_512x512.png` (512x512).
Add the generated dish static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-pepperoni-pizza.dim_512x512.png` (512x512).
Add the generated dish static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-hawaiian-pizza.dim_512x512.png` (512x512).
Add the generated dish static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-garlic-breadsticks.dim_512x512.png` (512x512).
Add the generated dish static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-caesar-salad.dim_512x512.png` (512x512).

requirements.summary: Update centralized image mapping so Pizza Palace and its menu items resolve by name to the new generated static assets wherever images render.
acceptanceCriteria: In the restaurants list and restaurant detail views, Pizza Palace uses the new Pizza Palace cover image.
In the Pizza Palace restaurant detail view, each of the 5 Pizza Palace menu items displays its corresponding new dish image (not the generic dish fallback).
Image resolution changes are made via the centralized helpers in `frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts` (no duplicate ad-hoc mapping elsewhere).

file_operations.description: Update centralized name-based mappings so restaurant name "Pizza Palace" resolves to `frontend/public/assets/generated/restaurant-pizza-palace-cover.dim_1200x600.png` and dish names (Margherita Pizza, Pepperoni Pizza, Hawaiian Pizza, Garlic Breadsticks, Caesar Salad) resolve to `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-margherita-pizza.dim_512x512.png`, `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-pepperoni-pizza.dim_512x512.png`, `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-hawaiian-pizza.dim_512x512.png`, `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-garlic-breadsticks.dim_512x512.png`, `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-caesar-salad.dim_512x512.png`, ensuring all UI uses the centralized helpers (no ad-hoc mapping elsewhere).
